channel.title: Comments on: OpenEars 1.1, plugins, and RapidEars live recognition for iOS!
channel.description: iOS Frameworks for speech recognition, text to speech and more

item.title: By: Halle
item.dc:creator: Halle
item.description:
Hi Corey,
You can license the plugin at /shop/rapidears, and the new Rejecto plugin which helps improve accuracy can be licensed at /shop/rejecto.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Corey,

You can license the plugin at /shop/rapidears, and the new Rejecto plugin which helps improve accuracy can be licensed at /shop/rejecto.

item.title: By: Corey
item.dc:creator: Corey
item.description: Where do we go to purchase the full plugin, not just the demo? I seem to be missing it on your site.
item.content:encoded:
Where do we go to purchase the full plugin, not just the demo?
I seem to be missing it on your site.
